committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Act of June 20, 1910, to clarify in the State of New Mexico authority to exchange lands granted by the United States in trust, and to validate prior land exchanges.

summary.text: Amends the New Mexico Enabling Act to authorize the State commissioner of public lands to exchange any land granted or confirmed by such Act for other Federal and public lands under certain specified conditions. Grants congressional consent to certain amendments to the New Mexico Constitution effective June 20, 1910.

titles.title: To amend the Act of June 20, 1910, to clarify in the State of New Mexico authority to exchange lands granted by the United States in trust, and to validate prior land exchanges.
